org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.querymatcher

类 ExplicitColumnTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.querymatcher.ExplicitColumnTracker
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ColumnTracker, ShipperListener

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class ExplicitColumnTracker
extends Object
implements ColumnTracker
    This class is used for the tracking and enforcement of columns and numbers of versions during the course of a Get or Scan operation, when explicit column qualifiers have been asked for in the query. With a little magic (see ScanQueryMatcher), we can use this matcher for both scans and gets. The main difference is 'next' and 'done' collapse for the scan case (since we see all columns in order), and we only reset between rows.

    This class is utilized by ScanQueryMatcher mainly through two methods:

    • checkColumn(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Cell, byte) is called when a Put satisfies all other conditions of the query.
    • getNextRowOrNextColumn(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Cell) is called whenever ScanQueryMatcher believes that the current column should be skipped (by timestamp, filter etc.)

    These two methods returns a ScanQueryMatcher.MatchCode to define what action should be taken.

    This class is NOT thread-safe as queries are never multi-threaded

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ExplicitColumnTracker

        public ExplicitColumnTracker(NavigableSet<byte[]> columns,
                             int minVersions,
                             int maxVersions,
                             long oldestUnexpiredTS)
        Default constructor.
        参数:
        columns - columns specified user in query
        minVersions - minimum number of versions to keep
        maxVersions - maximum versions to return per column
        oldestUnexpiredTS - the oldest timestamp we are interested in, based on TTL

    • 方法详细资料

      • done

        public boolean done()
        Done when there are no more columns to match against.
        指定者:
        done 在接口中 ColumnTracker
        返回:
        true when done.

      • getColumnHint

        public org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.querymatcher.ColumnCount getColumnHint()
        从接口复制的说明: ColumnTracker
        Used by matcher and scan/get to get a hint of the next column to seek to after checkColumn() returns SKIP. Returns the next interesting column we want, or NULL there is none (wildcard scanner). Implementations aren't required to return anything useful unless the most recent call was to checkColumn() and the return code was SKIP. This is pretty implementation detail-y, but optimizations are like that.
        指定者:
        getColumnHint 在接口中 ColumnTracker
        返回:
        null, or a ColumnCount that we should seek to

      • checkColumn

        public ScanQueryMatcher.MatchCode checkColumn(Cell cell,
                                              byte type)
        Checks if the column is present in the list of requested columns by returning the match code instance. It does not check against the number of versions for the columns asked for. To do the version check, one has to call ColumnTracker.checkVersions(Cell, long, byte, boolean) method based on the return type (INCLUDE) of this method. The values that can be returned by this method are ScanQueryMatcher.MatchCode.INCLUDE, ScanQueryMatcher.MatchCode.SEEK_NEXT_COL and ScanQueryMatcher.MatchCode.SEEK_NEXT_ROW.
        指定者:
        checkColumn 在接口中 ColumnTracker
        参数:
        cell - a cell with the column to match against
        type - The type of the Cell
        返回:
        The match code instance.

      • checkVersions

        public ScanQueryMatcher.MatchCode checkVersions(Cell cell,
                                                long timestamp,
                                                byte type,
                                                boolean ignoreCount)
                                         throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: ColumnTracker
        Keeps track of the number of versions for the columns asked for. It assumes that the user has already checked if the cell needs to be included by calling the ColumnTracker.checkColumn(Cell, byte) method. The enum values returned by this method are ScanQueryMatcher.MatchCode.SKIP, ScanQueryMatcher.MatchCode.INCLUDE, ScanQueryMatcher.MatchCode.INCLUDE_AND_SEEK_NEXT_COL and ScanQueryMatcher.MatchCode.INCLUDE_AND_SEEK_NEXT_ROW. Implementations which include all the columns could just return ScanQueryMatcher.MatchCode.INCLUDE in the ColumnTracker.checkColumn(Cell, byte) method and perform all the operations in this checkVersions method.
        指定者:
        checkVersions 在接口中 ColumnTracker
        参数:
        cell - a cell with the column to match against
        timestamp - The timestamp of the cell.
        type - the type of the key value (Put/Delete)
        ignoreCount - indicates if the KV needs to be excluded while counting (used during compactions. We only count KV's that are older than all the scanners' read points.)
        返回:
        the scan query matcher match code instance
        抛出:
        IOException - in case there is an internal consistency problem caused by a data corruption.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        从接口复制的说明: ColumnTracker
        Resets the Matcher
        指定者:
        reset 在接口中 ColumnTracker

      • doneWithColumn

        public void doneWithColumn(Cell cell)
        从接口复制的说明: ColumnTracker
        This method is used to inform the column tracker that we are done with this column. We may get this information from external filters or timestamp range and we then need to indicate this information to tracker. It is currently implemented for ExplicitColumnTracker.
        指定者:
        doneWithColumn 在接口中 ColumnTracker

      • isDone

        public boolean isDone(long timestamp)
        从接口复制的说明: ColumnTracker
        Give the tracker a chance to declare it's done based on only the timestamp to allow an early out.
        指定者:
        isDone 在接口中 ColumnTracker
        返回:
        true to early out based on timestamp.
